subject: COME RECEIVE YOUR COMPENSATION
body:
Attn:


The compensation exercise committee just selected you.  I am a UN Agent in charge of Category “E” Compensation Payment Scheme which is done by (ATM CARD). As a legal practitioner by profession I was entrusted to this office to bring sanity to its practices.I was just appointed to bring in professionalism to this office to ensure monies that were recovered from scam artists voted for compensation were judiciously distributed.  it's the (UN) Anti-Crime Commission and (IMF) in their wisdom ordered that monies recovered should be shared among 100 lucky people around the world for compensation and the selections were done basically from those of you whose email addresses were found in the scam artists file and computer hard-disk and that was how you were selected among the scam victims to be compensated. It is an exercise put together by (UN), (FBI) and (ICC) in order to alleviate sufferings of those that have been victimized by scammers.I have to bring every beneficiary and everyone must receive his/her ATM CARD and no one will be left out. I am informing you now that your ATM CARD is ready and it will be sent alongside clearance and authorization certificate to your address.

Therefore you are only required to reconfirm your information for the courier to deliver your ATM CARD to you.

Thank you and your anticipated response is highly needed

Yours faithfully

Mr.Brian Martin
United Kingdom

subject: Re: COME RECEIVE YOUR COMPENSATION
body:
Hello Martin,

Wow, this sounds like an incredible opportunity! I can't believe I've been selected. Could you please tell me more about this Category Payment Scheme? How does it work exactly?

Also, could you explain a bit more about the ATM card? Is it like a regular bank card that I can use anywhere?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Richard

subject: Re: COME RECEIVE YOUR COMPENSATION
body:
Attn: Richard





Like I earlier said, you are among those that were selected from the information that was discovered from the scammer’s computers and you stand for compensation. The compensation is done by a DEBIT ATM CARD which they are ready to be dispatched. That is why you got my message to come forward with a requirement to send your card and clearance certificates to you.  Though the designated paying bank and the designated courier put the cost of delivery from all beneficiaries at $1000 which must be made available alongside the following information below.



Please you have to reconfirm your following information as stated below.



1.       Your Full legal Names

2.       Receiver Address

3.       Copy of Identification

4.     Mobile  Line



Get the information across to me and get the fee ready for payment and as soon as payment is confirmed the DHL will make delivery to you in just 3 working days.





Yours faithfully



Mr.Brian Martin

United Kingdom

subject: Re: COME RECEIVE YOUR COMPENSATION
body:
Hello Martin from the United Kingdom,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite thrilled to hear that I was selected, although I must admit, it's a bit surprising! Could you please explain more about how this selection process works? How did my name appear on the scammer computers?

Also, could you provide more details about this DEBIT ATM CARD? What is its purpose and how can it be used?

I'm sorry but I'm not comfortable sharing personal information like my full legal name, address, or mobile line over email. Is there another way we can proceed without me having to share these details?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Richard

subject: Re: COME RECEIVE YOUR COMPENSATION
body:
Attn: Richard


This is a compensation scheme which is more of helping those that were devastated by scammers. I don't think I'm planted here to waste time with anyone who doesn't want to follow the rules of the exercise so therefore since you cannot share your information  it's assumed you are not interested I have to move to the next beneficiary online because I have several beneficiaries to attend to in this exercise thank you.



Yours faithfully



Mr.Brian Martin

United Kingdom

subject: Re: COME RECEIVE YOUR COMPENSATION
body:
Hello Martin from the United Kingdom,

It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm really interested in your scheme to help those affected by scammers. It sounds like a noble cause. Could you please tell me more about how it works? How do you identify and support these individuals?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Richard

subject: Re: COME RECEIVE YOUR COMPENSATION
body:
Attn: Richard

Today is Sunday and I need to treat your case before tomorrow. Let me know if our discussion goes well for the DHL to come pick up your DEBIT ATM CARD and CLEARANCE DOCUMENTS for delivery from tomorrow Monday. Understand that this exercise is put together by some financial institutions and your DEBIT ATM CARD is actually ready and if you need a sample I will have it scanned and sent to you to see, however the fee to deliver it is pegged at $1000 which is insurance and delivery.



This is an exercise put together by several organizations to alleviate sufferings of victims like you as you were selected for compensation. Many beneficiaries have received their DEBIT ATM CARDS, we are also waiting for you to make provision to deliver yours too.



I need to hear from you.

Yours faithfully



Mr.Brian Martin

United Kingdom

subject: Re: COME RECEIVE YOUR COMPENSATION
body:
Hello Martin,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's a pleasant surprise to hear that I've been selected for this exercise. I'm curious, how was I chosen? 

Also, could you please provide more details about the DEBIT ATM CARD and CLEARANCE DOCUMENTS? What are they exactly and how can they be used?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Richard
